name: Time Waits For Me
description:
Submission to the cozy fall jam 2021, made in two days.

There isn't much to do in this game, you can kill enemies with your grenade launcher and aim your grenade launcher at your feet and shoot to jump higher, you can also slow down time with right mouse button.

I almost ran out of time, so I hope this is playable

If you record a video of this game, please send it to me via itch.io or twitter.
